page.title: 07Farming in Wootton Bassett
page.content: Sheep Lambs Cattle Acres Kenderick's. 0 0 155 52 Wootton. 0 0 53 130 Lanes. 0 0 34 56 Manor. 80 140 100 123 Thunderbrook Est. 0 65 800 Vale. 0 0 100-150 50 Barnhill. 0 0 68 80 Little Park. 0 0 3 230 Greenhill 200 0 0 148 Old Park Farm 0 0 46 230 Hart Farm 14 0 76 129 Tockenham Manor 0 320 650 Farms are mainly small dairy or beef producers,dairy on a 50% replacement & beef sold at 18mths.Main{arable areas} include Th.Est. 315 acres,Tock.Manor 375 acres & Old Park with 217 acres. Other{livestock}include Old Park with 850 pigs & Little Park with 30 horses. A large cattle market started in 1836 in the High St. lasted till 1939.
